Maribel enjoys the simplicity of managing her loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar, eggs, cookies, candy, cooking oil, and other products

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es:
La señora Brígida es socia del Banco Comunal “8 de Septiembre” del distrito de Acora, Provincia de el Collao, Departamento de Puno; tiene 44 años de edad, de estado civil casada, tiene 07  hijos, vive en el Sector Charapata, estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela R. hace 1 año, su préstamo inicial fue de S/.  300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió comprar ganado ovino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 400.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorde, el mismo que será vendido en la feria semanal.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y los encuentros
texts.en:
Sra. Brigida is a member of the September 8th Communal Bank which is located in the District of Acora, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 44 years old, married, and has 7 children. Brigida lives in the Charapata region and has an elementary school education.

She has been working with Manuela R. for one year. Her initial loan of 300 soles enabled her to buy sheep.

Brigida is currently requesting a new loan of 400 soles to acquire additional sheep for fattening. She plans to sell them at the weekly fairs. Her greatest wish is to continue working. Brigida enjoys her savings and the Communal Bank meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sheep

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La señora Yolanda es socia del Banco Comunal “8 de Septiembre” del distrito de Acora, Provincia de el Collao, Departamento de Puno; tiene 27 años de edad, de estado civil casada, tiene 01  hijo, vive en el Sector Central, estudio educación secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 1 año, su préstamo inicial fue de S/.  300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió comprar ganado ovino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para cría, el que será vendido en la feria semanal, la señora Yola también se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías en miniatura para apoyarse.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando y ayudar a su hijo.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las reuniones.

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado ovino

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: capital de trabajo.

loans.name: Nacy Yola

texts.es:
La señora  Yola es socia del Banco Comunal “8 de Septiembre” del distrito de Acora, Provincia de el Collao, Departamento de Puno; tiene 36 años de edad, de estado civil viuda, tiene 03  hijos, vive en el Sector Central, estudio educación secundaria incompleta (3er grado).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 ciclos, su préstamo inicial fue de S/.  300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió comprar ganado ovino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para venderlo en carne, o también los vende vivos en las ferias de la semana.

Su mayor deseo es poder sacar profesionales a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  la puntualidad y los ahorros.

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado ovino.

loans.name: Bertha Beatriz

texts.es:
La señora Bertha es socia del Banco Comunal “8 de Septiembre” del distrito de Acora, Provincia de el Collao, Departamento de Puno; tiene 25 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 02  hijos, vive en el Sector Iscacatura, estudio educación secundaria incompleta (4to grado).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela R. hace casi varios años, es una de las socias fundadoras, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de gallinas.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorde, ella luego los vende en la feria semanal, LA señora Bertha también se dedica a la artesanía.

Su mayor deseo es hacer crecer su capital y formar una empresa.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y las facilidades en los préstamos

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado ovino.

loans.name: Gloria Hermelinda

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Gloria; ella pertenece al banco comunal Chaska ñahui, situado en la ciudad del Cusco.

Nuestra socia tiene 59 años de edad, ella es  casada y tiene 1 hijo, nuestra socia alterna sus actividades del hogar y sus otras labores, con el servicio de hotelería, nuestra socia trabaja en un hotel de tres estrellas muy conocido y céntrico, ella se encarga de la mantelería y el servicio de alimentos dentro del hotel. Nuestra socia solicita el préstamo en razón de invertir en la compra de un mueble, que irá pagando poco a poco con su sueldo del hotel.

Nuestra socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This is Sra. Gloria. She is a member of the Chaska Ñahui Communal Bank, which is located in the city of Cusco.

Gloria is 59 years old, married, and has 1 child. She divides her time between her household chores and her other jobs. Gloria works at a 3 star hotel that is well-known and centrally located. She is in charge of housekeeping and food services for the hotel.

Gloria is requesting a loan to buy furniture. She will gradually repay her loan from her hotel salary. She appreciates and values the loans that have been provided to her. Gloria promises to make her payments on the established due dates.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase furniture

loans.name: Dalmesio

texts.es:
El socio Dalmesio; es natural de la ciudad del Cusco y ella pertenece al banco comunal, Chaska ñahui, ubicado en la ciudad del Cusco

Nuestro socio tiene 43 años de edad es casado y tiene 2 hijos, nuestro socio trabaja en un hotel de tres estrellas, muy reconocido en el medio y el está encargado del área de recepción, el socio solicita el préstamo para poder efectuar una compra personal de un mueble, el socio pagará está deuda con su sueldo mensual que le genera el hotel.

Nuestro socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.

loans.use: uso personal

loans.name: Fanni Rosa

texts.es:
La socia Fanni Rosa; es natural de la ciudad del Cusco y ella pertenece al banco comunal, Chaska ñahui, ubicado en la ciudad del Cusco.

La socia tiene 40 años de edad, ella es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos, nuestra socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con el arte, ella es cantante de profesión y trabaja en la peña la rústica, nuestra socia solicita el préstamo para cubrir algunos inconvenientes que tiene.

Nuestra socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y de este modo se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con el banco comunal y pagar sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Fanni Rosa was born in the city of Cusco and is a member of the communal bank Chaska ñahui, located in Cusco. She is 40 years old and a single mother with two children. She divides her time between her household labors and her art: she is a singer by profession and works in a peña (a gathering place offering folk music and traditional food) called La Rústica. She is requesting a loan to cover some of her recent expenses. Fanni appreciates and values the loan offered to her, and she has made a commitment to continue fulfilling the requirements of the communal bank and making her payments on schedule.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Paying recent expenses

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La socia Margarita, es natural D. la ciudad del Cusco y ella pertenece al banco comunal, Chaska ñahui, ubicado en la ciudad del Cusco.

Nuestra socia tiene 60 años D. edad, ella es casada, tiene 2 hijos, y alterna sus actividades del hogar con la administración D. su tienda D. abarrotes,  nuestra socia tiene su pequeño negocio en la esquina D. su casa y ella solicita el préstamo para comprar mayor mercadería y así poder implementar su tienda.

Nuestra socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus deuda en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Margarita was born in Cusco and is a member of the communal bank Chaska ñahui, located in Cusco. She is 60 years old and married with two children. She divides her time between her household labors and the management of her small business: a small general store which she operates in a corner of her home. She is requesting this loan to purchase larger quantities of merchandise to sell in her store. She appreciates and values the loan offered to her in this manner, and she is committed to making her loan payments on time.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Stocking her general store

loans.name: Fok Nou Chanje De Grand Basin Group

texts.en:
The “Fok Nou Chanje de Grand Basin” or “We must Change of Grand Basin” Group is a made of twenty male and female entrepreneurs. After hearing about the good things that are happening to other business owners in the area they are happy tom receive their loans. There is a wide variety of businesses in the group from gas for small lamps to oil for cooking, and food to motorcycle and bicycle repair. Ulysse C. is one of four representatives of the group. He is 35yrs old, married, and has one child.
The hardworking father runs a small motorcycle and bicycle repair shop, and also sells parts to other clients and shops in the area. He has two other mechanics that help him with the repairs depending on the work. In retrospect Ulysse says “he wished he joined earlier…because Esperanza wants to help the poor change their situation.” He hopes for a better tomorrow for himself and his family as he strives to grow his business. On behalf of Ulysse, Fok Nou Chanje, and Esperanza we thank you for your support.

loans.use: various bi cycle and motorcycle parts, tools

loans.name: Jose Wilber

texts.es:
El socio Jose; es natural de la ciudad del Cusco y ella pertenece al banco comunal, Chaska ñahui, ubicado en la ciudad del Cusco

Nuestro socio tiene 54 años de edad, él es soltero y tiene una peluquería en matara, nuestro socio trabaja 32 años con este negocio y es muy bueno en los cortes y peinados por lo que goza de buena fama y su trabajo es muy reconocido. Nuestro socio solicita el préstamo para poder implementar su pequeño negocio de peluquería y de este modo hacerlo crecer un poco más y brindar mejor calidad a sus clientes.

Nuestro socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de su deuda en el plazo establecido.

loans.use: implementar su pequeño negocio de peluquería

loans.name: Policarpio

texts.es:
El socio Policarpio; es natural de la ciudad del Cusco y ella pertenece al banco comunal, Chaska ñahui, ubicado en la ciudad del Cusco

Nuestro socio tiene 42 años de edad, nuestro socio es soltero y es técnico en peluquería, el socio tiene una peluquería en pavitos y se dedica a cortar, teñir, peinar y mucho más en cuanto a cabellos de damas, caballeros y niños. Nuestro socio desea el préstamo para invertir en su pequeño negocio y de este modo hacerlo crecer un poco más.

Nuestro socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Policapio is a Cusco native and a member of the ¨ Chaska ñahui¨ Community Bank in the city of Cusco.

He is 42 years old, single and is a hairdresser technician. He owns a hair saloon in “Pavitos”, and is dedicated to hair cutting, coloring and styling for women, men and children. This member is asking for a loan that will be invested in his small business to help it grow.

He appreciates and values the loan and is committed to make the payments on time.

Translated from Spanish by Adriana Pierce, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
La socia Bertha, es natural D. la ciudad D. Cusco, ella pertenece al banco comunal,” Fuerza Compartida”, ubicado en la ciudad del Cusco en el distrito D. huanchac.

Nuestra socia tiene 43 años D. edad, ella tiene 3 hijos, nuestra socia es casada y alterna sus actividades del hogar con el trabajo D. auxiliar en un jardín D. niños, nuestra socia ama a los niños, tiene la paciencia y la dulzura que los merecen. Nuestra socia solicita el préstamo para uso personal, ella cubrirá mes a mes los pagos D. las cuotas con su sueldo, por el momento ella desea invertir este dinerito en un trabajito adicional al del jardín D. niños.

Nuestra socia se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus deudas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Bertha is a native of Cusco and a member of the Community Bank "Fuerza Compartida", which is located in the city of Cusco, Huanchaco district.

Our partner is 43 years old, is married and has 3 children. She alternates her household activities with her job as an assistant in a kindergarten. She loves children, is patient and sweet.

She is asking for a personal loan and will make monthly payments with her salary. She wants to invest the loan money in an additional activity than her kindergarten job.

She agrees to make the payments on time.

Translated from Spanish by Adriana Pierce, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Personal Use

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas.
Paulina es soltera, tiene 27 años y vive con sus padres, Paulina junto a su madre tienen una polleria en su casa, actividad que realiza todos los días, además Paulina trabaja en una institución y estudia Contabilidad Técnica.
Paulina necesita un préstamo de 1500 soles dinero que será invertido en el pintado de su local.
Los sueños de Paulina son terminar de estudiar su carrera y abrir un estudio contable en el centro de la ciudad.

loans.use: Para el pintado de su local.

loans.name: Elena Isabel

texts.es:
Elena es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas.
Elena es soltera, tiene 40 años y 3 hijos, Elena vende ropa variada a pedido, sus productos los ofrece a amigos y familiares, sus productos los adquiere en la ciudad de Huancayo.
Elena necesita un préstamo de 1300 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de polos, pantalones.
Los sueños de Elena son tener una tienda y surtir su negocio.

loans.use: Para la compra de polos, pantalones.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La socia Julia, es natural de la provincia de Quillabamba, ella pertenece al banco comunal,” Fuerza Compartida”, ubicado en la ciudad del Cusco en el distrito de huanchac.

Nuestra socia tiene 36 años de edad, ella es casada y la socia tiene 3 hijos, nuestra socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la enseñanza, ella ama a los niños por lo que su pasión la llevó a estudiar educación inicial, trabaja como auxiliar en un jardín para niños llamado corazones felices. Nuestra socia requiere el préstamo para uso personal y el cuál irá cubriendo con su sueldo mensual.

Nuestra socia valora y agradece el crédito otorgado comprometiéndose a cumplir con el pago en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Julia is a native of the province Quillabamba and a member of the Community Bank "Fuerza Compartida", located in the city of Cusco, Huanchaco District. She is 36 years old, married and has 3 children. She alternates her household activities with a teaching job. She loves children. Her passion led her to study early childhood education and to work as an assistant in a preschool called “ Corazones Felices”.

She is asking for a loan for personal use, which She will repay with her monthly salary. She appreciates the loan and is committed to repay it on time.

Translated from Spanish by Adriana Pierce, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Personal Use

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas.
Isabel es separada, tiene 40 años y 5 hijos, Isabel vende frutas variadas de manera ambulatoria en la puerta del cementerio central de la ciudad de Ayacucho, actividad que realiza todos los días con la ayuda de su hija.
Isabel necesita un préstamo de 1600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de frutas.
El sueño de Isabel es tener una tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Isabel is a member of the “Hormigas” Community Bank. Isabel is 40 years old, divorced and has 5 children.

Elizabeth sells fruits at the entrance of the central cemetery in the city of Ayacucho, activity that she performs every day with the help of her daughter. Isabella is asking for a loan of $575 which will be invested in the purchase of fruit.

Isabel's dream is to have a grocery shop.

Translated from Spanish by Adriana Pierce, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Janny

texts.es:
Janny es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas.
Janny es soltera, tiene 32 años y 1 hija, Janny se dedica a la elaboración de panes típicos como chapla, actividad que realiza en el horno de su mama para lo cual cuenta con la ayuda de 2 personas, sus ventas los realiza en el mercado central de la ciudad.
Janny necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra leña.
Janny sueña con dar un buen acabado a su casa y brindar una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Janny is a member of the Community Bank “ Hormigas”. She is 32 years old and the single mother of one daughter. Janny is dedicated to the making of traditional breads as “Chapla”, which she makes in her mothers’ oven and with the help of 2 people. She sells them at the central market of the city.

Janny is asking for a loan of $375 which will be invested in buying firewood. Janny’s dreams are to finish her home and provide a good education for her children.

Translated from Spanish by Adriana Pierce, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy firewood

loans.name: Delfina

texts.es:
Delfina es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas.
Delfina es casada, tiene 56 años y 4 hijos, Delfina viaja a las diferentes ferias de la región en donde vende comida, actividad que realiza 3 veces por semana, además vende desayuno todos los días.
Delfina necesita un préstamo de 1300 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar.
Los sueños de Delfina son mejorar su negocio y tener una casa propia.
texts.en:
Delfina is a member of the communal bank "Hormigas." She is married, 56 years old and has 4 children. She travels to the different markets in the region where she sells food; she does this three times a week and also sells breakfast every day. Delfina needs a loan of 1300 soles to invest in the purchase of rice and sugar. Delfina dreams of improving her business and having her own house.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy rice and sugar

loans.name: Armanda

texts.es:
Armanda tiene 50 años, vive con sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Desde que era niña sus padres se han dedicado a la fabricación de panes en un horno artesanal, esas habilidades las heredó ella y ahora vende sus panes en las ferias comerciales de una ciudad aledaña a la suya. Su hija mayor es quien la ayuda a laborar estos panes y actualmente están usando el horno que les presta uno de sus familiares. Armanda quiere mejorar su panadería y tener máquinas especializadas para la elaboración de sus productos. 

Esta es la tercera oportunidad en que tiene un crédito con MFP, ella es una socia activa y puntual en su grupo y desea seguir mejorando su negocio con préstamos posteriores. El dinero que ahora solicita será destinado a la compra de materiales de construcción para la construcción de su propio horno artesanal.
texts.en:
Armanda is 50 years old and lives with her two children in her own home. Ever since she was young her parents have been making breads in a traditional wood-fired oven. She inherited those skills and now she sells her bread in the commercial markets in a city adjacent to hers. Her oldest daughter helps her with the production of the bread, and currently they are using an oven that has been lent to them by relatives. Armanda would like to improve her bakery and have specialized machinery for making her products. This is the third time that she is taking a loan with MFP. She is an active member and has been punctual in her group and desires to continue improving her business with subsequent loans. The money that she is now requesting will be used to buy construction materials for the construction of her own traditional wood-fired oven.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: construction of her own traditional wood-fired oven

loans.name: Albina

texts.es:
Albina es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas.
Albina es casada, tiene 45 años y 6 hijos, Albina viaja a las diferentes ferias de la región en donde compra animales menores, quesos, productos que vende en la ciudad de Lima además vende panes. Albina también tiene una tienda de abarrotes en su casa.
Albina necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de queso, carne, azúcar y arroz.
Albina sueña con mejorar y hacer crecer su negocio.

loans.use: Para la compra de queso, carne, azúcar y arroz.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina tiene 34 años, vive en casa de sus padres con sus 3 hijos de 12, 6, y 2 años. Hace 2 años decidió que la mejor forma de generarse ingresos económicos era con la venta de animales (cerdos). Ella compra estos animales en la feria ganadera de su localidad y luego los vende a precios más altos; en esta oportunidad, como se muestra en la foto, ya no contaba con ningún cerdo, pero cuando no logra venderlos todos, los cuida en su establo durante una semana. 

Cristina cuanta con el apoyo de sus hijos para la venta de sus animales y con la experiencia ganada durante este tiempo aprendió a seleccionar a los cerdos para no ser engañada con animales enfermos. Su deseo a futuro es continuar con este negocio pero incrementar su capital de trabajo. 

Esta es la segunda oportunidad en que tiene un crédito con MFP y en su anterior préstamo fue puntual en sus pagos, además de sentirse contenta porque aprendido el valor del trabajo en equipo. El dinero que ahora solicita lo utilizará en la compra de más cerdos y aprovechar esta temporada que es cuando se venden con mayor frecuencia.
texts.en:
Cristina is 34 years old. She lives in her parents home with her 3 children ages12, 6, and 2 years. Two years ago she decided that the best economic way to generate income was with the sale of animals (hogs). She buys these animals in the livestock market of her area and then she sells them for higher prices. In this endeavor, as she is shown in the photo (although without any hogs), when she fails to sell them all, she takes care of them in her stable for a week. Cristina counts on the income from the sale of her animals for the support of her children. With the experience she has gained during this time she has learned to select the best hogs and not to be deceived by sick animals. Her wish for the future is to continue in this business and to increase her working capital. This is the second opportunity in which she has requested a loan from MFP. In her previous loan she was punctual with her payments, besides being happy because she learned the value of teamwork. The money that she now requests will be used to purchase more hogs and to take advantage of this season when they are sold with greater frequency.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy more hogs that she sells.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
Edith tiene 24 años, vive con sus padres en la casa de ellos. Hace un mes aproximadamente decidió abrir su propia tienda de comestibles, anteriormente estuvo apoyando a sus padres en las tareas agrícolas, pero con los ahorros que disponía logró invertir sabiamente en el negocio que actualmente desempeña. Edith atiende a sus clientes durante todo el día y lo que más desea en este momento es incrementar la cantidad de mercadería que ofrece, lo cual también es motivo de esta solicitud de crédito.

Ella es parte de un banco comunal y este es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP, Edith está muy entusiasmada con su nuevo negocio, por lo que se compromete a pagar puntualmente todas sus cuotas como lo hizo en su préstamo anterior.

loans.use: Incremento de mercadería

loans.name: Gladys Reyna

texts.es:
Gladis es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas
Gladis es casada, tiene 40 años y 4 hijos, Gladis tiene una tienda en su casa en donde vende abarrotes en general, verduras, además Gladis vende comida en la puerta de su tienda, actividad que realiza por las noches.
Gladis necesita un préstamo de 1500 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar.
Los sueños de Gladis son ampliar sus negocios.

loans.use: Para la compra de arroz, azúcar.

loans.name: Georgina Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas
Blanca es casada, tiene 46 años y 4 hijos, Blanca se dedica a la venta de medicina natural por catálogos que ofrece a amigos y familiares, además Blanca vende ollas Renaware.
Blanca necesita un préstamo de 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de medicina natural.
Los sueños de Blanca es ampliar su negocio y brindar una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Blanca is a member of the Hormigas Communal Bank. Blanca is married. She is 46 years old and has 4 children. She is dedicated to the sale of natural medicines via catalogs that she offers to her freinds and acquaintances. In addition, she sells Renaware pots. Blanca needs a loan of 2000 soles, which will be invested in the purchase of natural medicines. Blanca dreams of growing her business and offering a good quality of life to her children.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy natural medicines for resale

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora Maria es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” ubicado en  Villa Queñuani, del distrito D. Yunguyo, Provincia D. Yunguyo, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 64 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos, vive en la comunidad D. Sucana, estudio educación secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace muchos años es una D. las socias fundadoras y su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. aji.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/.3000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado vacuno, por otro lado la señora se dedica a la compra venta D. aji.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las facilidades en los préstamos.
texts.en:
Señora Maria is an associate of the "Virgin of the Rosary" Communal Bank, located in Queñuani Village , of the district of Yunguyo, Province of Yunguyo, Department of Puno. She is 64 years of age, married and has 4 children. She lives in the community of Sucana and has completed her studies through secondary school. The lady began working with the Manuela Ramos Movement many years ago. She is one of the associate founders and her initial loan was for 300 soles, which permitted her to increase her capital for the business of buying and selling peppers. Currently she requires a new loan of 3000 soles, which will permit her to buy cattle. In addition she is dedicated to the buying and selling of peppers. Her greatest desire is to continue working.. She appreciates the savings and the flexibility of the loans from Manuela Ramos.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es:
La señora Hilaria es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito D. Yunguyo, Provincia D. Yunguyo, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 60 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada, tiene 07 hijos, vive en el Barrio Central, no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años ella es una D. las socias fundadoras del Banco Comunal, inicio su préstamo con la suma D. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. ropa.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar D. ropa casacas, pabnatlones, camisas, etc, la señora Hilaria también se dedica a la compra venta D. ají y a la crianza D. ganado mayor.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  las facilidades en los préstamos y los ahorros
texts.en:
Hilaria is a member of the "Virgen del Rosario" communal bank, located in Villa Queñuani, in the Yunguyo district, Yunguyo province, Puno department. She is 60 years old, married, and has 7 children. She lives in the Barrio Central neighborhood, and did not have the opportunity to study.

She has been working the the Manuela Ramos movement (a Peruvian women's rights organization) for several years. She is one of the founding members of her communal bank. She had her first loan of PEN 300, which let allowed her to increase her capital for her clothing sales business.

Now she needs a new loan of PEN 2500, which will allow her to buy jackets, pants, shirts, etc. Hilaria also sells chili peppers and raises livestock.

Her greatest wish is to continue working.

She likes the ease of savings and loans with her bank.

Translated from Spanish by Rebecca Iverson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy jackets, pants, shirts, etc. in different sizes

loans.name: Liduvina

texts.es:
Liduvina es socia del Banco Comunal Violeta.
Liduvina es casada, tiene 38 años y 2 hijos, Liduvina tiene un restaurante polleria llamado Kevin Chicken, en un local alquilado ubicado en el centro de la ciudad, actividad que realiza todos los días con la ayuda de 9 personas.
Liduvina necesita un préstamo de 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz y azúcar.
Los sueños de Liduvina son ampliar su negocio, tener una cadena de pollerias y brindar una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Liduvina is a member of the Violeta communal bank.

Liduvina is married, 38 years old, and has 2 children. Liduvina has a chicken restaurant called Kevin Chicken, in a rented location located in the center of the city. She works there every day with the help of 9 people.

Liduvina needs a loan of PEN 2000 which she will invest in buying rice and sugar.

Liduvina's dreams are to grow her business, to have a chain of chicken restaurants, and to give a good quality of life to her children.

Translated from Spanish by Rebecca Iverson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy rice and sugar

loans.name: Karen Roxana

texts.es:
Karen es socia del Banco Comunal Violeta.
Karen es casada, tiene 37 años y 4 hijos, Karen junto a su esposo tienen 2 mototaxis que alquilan  diariamente, además compran y venden carros en la ciudad de Ayacucho.
Karen necesita un préstamo de 2500 soles dinero que será invertido como parte del capital para la compra de carros.
Los sueños de Karen son que sus hijos sean profesionales para que tengan un buen futuro.

loans.use: como parte del capital para la compra de carros.

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Juana es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito D. Yunguyo, Provincia D. Yunguyo, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 54 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada, tiene 07 hijos, vive en el Barrio Central, estudio solo hasta el 3er grado D. primaria.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años ella es una D. las socias fundadoras del Banco Comunal, inicio su préstamo con la suma D. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. ganado menor.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permite comprar sacos D. polietileno para la venta en las ferias D. la zona, la señora Juana también D. dedica a la cría D. ganado.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan las reuniones, las facilidades en los préstamos y los ahorros.

loans.use: Para la compra de sacos de polietileno.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
Cirila es socia del Banco Comunal Violeta.
Cirila es separada, tiene 46 años y 2 hijos, Cirila vende golosinas de manera ambulatoria en el parque central de la ciudad de Ayacucho, actividad que realiza todos los días por las noches.
Cirila necesita un préstamo de 800 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de golosinas, cigarros y chicles.
Los sueños de Cirila son salir adelante y que su hija culmine sus estudios.

loans.use: Para la compra de golosinas, cigarros y chicles.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra es socia del Banco Comunal Violeta.
Sandra es soltera, tiene 21 años y 2 hijos, Sandra vende golosinas de manera ambulatoria en el parque central de la ciudad de Ayacucho, actividad que realiza todos los días por las noches. Además Sandra vende emoliente en las fiestas patronales.
Sandra necesita un préstamo de 600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de golosinas.
Los sueños de Sandra son tener una tienda y comprar un terreno.
texts.en:
Sandra is a member of the Violeta Communal Bank. She is 21 years old, single, and has 2 children. Every evening, Sandra sells candy as a traveling merchant at the central park in the city of Ayacucho. She also sells emollients at the patron saint festivals.

Sandra needs a loan of 600 soles to buy more candy. She dreams of having a store and purchasing a plot of land.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase candy

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Antonia es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” ubicado en  Villa Queñuani, del distrito D. Yunguyo, Provincia D. Yunguyo, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 53 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada, tiene 08 hijos, vive en el Barrio Central, estudio solo el primer grado D. primaria.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años ella es una D. las socias fundadoras del Banco Comunal, inicio su préstamo con la suma D. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. abarrotes.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 1200.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar saquillos y sacos D. polietileno, además algunos abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, por toro lado ella se ayuda con la venta D. ganado.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan los ahorros y las reuniones.
texts.en:
Sra. Antonia is a member of the Communal Bank "Virgen del Rosario" located in Villa Queñuani in the District of Yunguyo, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 53 years old, married, and has 8 children. She lives in a central neighborhood and has a first graD. education.

Antonia has been working with Manuela Ramos for several years since she one of the founding members of her Communal Bank. Her first loan in the amount of 300 soles enabled her to increase her business capital for buying and selling groceries. She is now requesting a new loan of 1200 soles to purchase paper sacks and polyethylene bags, as well as grocery items such as rice and sugar. In addition, she plans to acquire a bull for her livestock business.

Her greatest wish is to continue working. Antonia enjoys her savings and the Communal Bank meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase paper sacks, polyethylene bags, rice, and sugar

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.es:
Genoveva es socia del Banco Comunal Violeta.
Genoveva es casada, tiene 51 años y 10 hijos, Genoveva viaja a la selva ayacuchana en donD. venD. verduras, abarrotes en general, frutas, cereales, actividad que realiza junto a su esposo.
Genoveva necesita un préstamo D. 1200 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. arroz, azúcar.
Los sueños D. Genoveva son brindar una buena educación a sus hijos y mejorar su negocio.

loans.use: Para la compra de arroz, azúcar.

loans.name: Nancy Helida

texts.es:
Nancy es socia del Banco Comunal Violeta.
Nancy es casada, tiene 38 años y 2 hijos, Nancy tiene una tienda Multiservicios en un local alquilado que se encuentra en el centro D. L. ciudad, en donD. venD. abarrotes en general, artículos D. librería, fotocopias.
Nancy necesita un préstamo D. 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en L. compra D. papeles, arroz, azúcar.
Nancy sueña con ampliar su negocio, tener otra tienda y brindarles una buena educación.

loans.use: Para la compra de papeles, arroz, azúcar.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Cristina es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” Ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 49 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, tiene 02 hijos, vive en el Barrio Porteño, estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 5 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de aji.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ají,  por otro lado la señora se dedica también a la cría de ganado menor y mayor y también elabora artesanías a pedido.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando para ayudar a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan las reuniones,  y los ahorros.

loans.use: Para la compra de aji.

loans.name: Marleni Marisol

texts.es:
La señora Marleni es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 29 años de edad, de estado civil casada, tiene 01 hijo, vive en el Barrio San Martín, estudio educación secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace casi 1 año, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de aji.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar aji para comercializarlo en Desaguadero, su otro negocio de la señora es la venta de ganado.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando para sacar adelante a su hijo.

A ella le  gustan los ahorros, las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Sra. Marleni is a member of the Communal Bank "Virgen del Rosario" located in Villa Queñuani in the District of Yunguyo, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 29 years old, married, and has 1 child. Marleni lives in the San Martín neighborhood and has a high school education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for almost a year. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 soles and was used to increase her business capital for buying and selling chili peppers. Marleni is currently requesting a new loan of 500 soles to purchase chili peppers that she will sell in Desaguadero. She also has another business selling livestock.

Her greatest wish is to continue working so that her son can get ahead. Marleni enjoys her savings, the Communal Bank meetings, and the seminars.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase chili peppers

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es:
La señora Vicenta es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 57 años de edad, de estado civil viuda, tiene 02 hijos, vive en el Barrio Vista Alegre, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 ciclos, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar de ganado vacuno para engorde.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan los ahorros y las charlas,

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado vacuno.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth tiene 32 años, vive con su esposo y sus hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 3 años se dedica a la siembra de quinua y papa, ella trabaja junto a su esposo, pero mientras esperan la cosecha, él busca otros oficios diferentes para obtener ingresos económicos extras, mientras Elizabeth se queda velando por el buen desarrollo de sus cultivos.

Cuando llega la temporada de cosecha toda su familia participa en esta actividad y lo que cosechan lo van vendiendo según los mejores precios del mercado, por ello almacena sus productos hasta que tengan un mayor costo. 

Esta es la segunda oportunidad en que tiene un crédito con MFP, durante su primer crédito demostró ser puntual en sus pagos, por lo que hoy se compromete a seguir siendo responsable con ellos. El dinero que ahora solicita lo utilizará en la compra de más terrenos de cultivo para incrementar su producción.

loans.use: Compra de terrenos de cultivo

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth A. is from the village of P-Bonifacio, Lugait, Misamis Oriental. She is 52 years old, is married, and has three adult children. Elizabeth owns and operates a business making and selling food, selling specialty food products in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month. In October 2009, Elizabeth joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be her first from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business. About HSPFI: HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es:
La señora Faustina es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” Ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 55 años de edad, de estado civil viuda, tiene 03 hijos, vive en el Barrio San Martín, estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar de ganado ovino  para engorde, ya que también se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando para ayudar en su hogar.

A ella le  gustan los ahorros y las charlas
texts.en:
Mrs. Faustina is a member of the communal bank “Vírgen del Rosario” located in Villa Queñuani, Yunguyo District, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno; she is 55 years old, is a widow, and has three kids. She lives in the San Martín neighborhood and she has completed primary school (6th grade). Faustina has been working with Kiva partner Movimiento Manuela Ramos for two years. Her first loan was for PEN 300, which allowed her to increase her capital for her business buying and selling cattle. Today, she is requesting a new loan of PEN 500, which will allow her to buy sheep, fatten them up, then resell them. She already raises cows. Faustina's biggest wish is to keep working to help out her family. She loves to save and to have conversations.

Translated from Spanish by Violeta Rubiani, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing sheep

loans.name: Nora

texts.en: Nora A. is from the village of Argayoso, Manticao, Misamis Oriental. She is 39 years old, is married, and has four school-aged children. Nora owns and operates a business buying and selling "copra", or dried coconut meat, in the local area. She has been engaged in her business for over four years and earns approximately 6,000 PHP a month. In 2009, Nora joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 4,000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used as additional capital for her business. Nora is requesting a new loan of 7,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be her 2nd from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to support the education of her children. About HSPFI: HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Celestina

texts.en: Celestina A. is from the village of P-7, Iligan City. She is 50 years old, is widowed, and has five adult children. Celestina owns and operates a fruit stall, selling a variety of fruits in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month. In October 2009, Celestina joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be her first from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business. About HSPFI: HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

location.town: P-7, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Ka

texts.en:
Ka S. is a 28 years old and is a resident of Battambang Province, where she has established a small family home and earns a living as a local farmer. She is married to Mr. Kem Thon, age 35, who works with her in the farming business. This couple has three school-aged kids, who are dependent on their income.

Ka S. finds it hard commuting to work on the farm or anywhere else, because she doesn’t have her own vehicle for her and her family’s traveling needs. She hopes to have a motor (motorcycle) but she doesn’t have enough money to buy one. Therefore, she decided to seek a loan from Kiva through HKL in order to purchase a used motor and use the rest of the loan to support the farm work.

loans.use: To purchase a used motorcycle and to support the farm

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan A. is from the village of Calawag, Barangay Pugaan, Iligan City. She is 43 years old, is married, and has nine school-aged children. Susan owns and operates a specialized retail store, selling a variety of basic-need products in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for over five years and earns approximately 7,000 PHP a month. In October 2009, Susan joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. This loan will be her first from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business. About HSPFI: HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase new items to expand her product offering

location.town: Calawag, Puga-an, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Châk

texts.en:
Châk C. is a 37-year-old farmer who lives in the farming area of Battambang Province. She is married with four children: two are married and live separately and two are dependent on her. Her husband works with her on the farm.

This couple currently owns a farm machine that they use for their farming. In addition, they use their machine to plow a nearby farmer’s land for profit. Unfortunately, the machine has often broken down during the plowing process. Because of this problem, Châk C. would like a loan to pay for having it repaired.

loans.use: To pay for having their farm machine repaired

loans.name: Solieta

texts.en: Solieta A. is a 49-year-old seamstress from Pasay City. She is married to Joseph, 52, a driver by profession. Only one among their three children remains in school; the two eldest are already making their own living. Solieta specializes in sewing intricate pillowcases of different designs, shapes and sizes. She has been doing this in the comfort of her home for the last twenty years. She earns at least P6,000 a month. Solieta became a member of the Center for Community Transformation (CCT) Credit Cooperative in 2005. She has just finished repaying her previous loan with the cooperative and has applied for a new loan amounting to P8,000 to buy materials for making pillowcases (fabric, thread and other supplies). Solieta works hard to support her husband in their desire to handle their child’s education. She also wishes to someday acquire a bigger shop outside of the city. About CCT The Center for Community Transformation (CCT) is an organized Christian response against poverty and social injustice. This is carried out through the fusion of social development initiatives and evangelical mission in a uniquely Filipino context. It serves urban and rural poor communities throughout the Philippines, in pursuit of its desire to see changed lives, strong families, and transformed communities centered in the Lordship of Jesus Christ. CCT is a member of the Five Talents family.

loans.use: To buy materials for making pillowcases

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La señora Sonia es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” Ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 32 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 02 hijos, vive en el Barrio Porteño, estudio educación secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 ciclos, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1200.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar de ganado vacuno para engorde, su otro negocio de la señora es la compra y venta de aji.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan los ahorros y las reuniones ya que dice se distrae con sus compañeras.
texts.en:
Mrs. Sonia is a member of the communal bank “Vírgen del Rosario” located in Villa Queñuani, Yunguyo District, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno; she is 32 years old, lives with her partner, and has two kids. She lives in the Porteño neighborhood and she has completed high school. Sonia has received two loans from Kiva partner Movimiento Manuela Ramos. Her first loan was for PEN 500, which allowed her to increase her capital for her business buying and selling cattle. Today, she is requesting a new loan of PEN 1,200, which will allow her to buy cows, fatten them up, then resell them. She already has a business buying and selling hot peppers. Sonia's biggest wish is to keep working. She loves to save and to go to the loan center's meetings, since she enjoys interacting with the other members.

Translated from Spanish by Violeta Rubiani, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying cows

loans.name: Eleuteria

texts.es:
La señora Eleuteria es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito D. Yunguyo, Provincia D. Yunguyo, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 65 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada, tiene 02 hijos, vive en el Barrio Central, estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace casi año y medio, inicio su préstamo con la suma D. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. ganado.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 1000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar D. ganado vacuno para engorD., tambié tienen ganado ovino para engorD..

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan los ahorros y los encuentros,
texts.en:
Mrs. Eleuteria is a member of the communal bank “Vírgen del Rosario” located in Villa Queñuani, Yunguyo District, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno; she is 65 years old, is married, and has two children. She lives in the Central neighborhood and she has completed primary school (6th graD.). Eleuteria has been working with Kiva partner Movimiento Manuela Ramos for almost one and a half years. Her first loan was for PEN 500, which allowed her to increase her capital for her business buying and selling cattle. Today, she is requesting a new loan of PEN 1,000, which will allow her to buy more cows, fatten them up, then resell them. She already raises sheep to fatten and sell. Faustina's biggest wish is to keep working. She loves to save and to go to gatherings.

Translated from Spanish by Violeta Rubiani, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying cows

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en: Rolando A. is from Barangay Pugaan, Iligan City. He is 34 years old, is married, and has two school-aged children. Rolando owns and operates a business using a motor vehicle to provide transport services to local community members. He has been engaged in his business for over five years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month. In October 2009, Rolando joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and his ability to engage in business activities. He is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase materials needed to provide service. This loan will be his first from HSPFI. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand his business. About HSPFI: HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase materials needed to provide service

location.town: Puga-an, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es:
La señora Valentina es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” Ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito D. Yunguyo, Provincia D. Yunguyo, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 49 años D. edad, D. estado civil conviviente, tiene 05 hijos, vive en el Barrio Porteño, estudio educación primaria incompleta (4to grado).

La señora inicia su trabajo con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos con un préstamo inicial D. S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. ganado mayor para poder ayudar a su nieta, ya que todos sus hijos ya están casados.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan las facilidades que se dan en los préstamos,
texts.en:
Mrs. Valentina is a member of the communal bank “Vírgen del Rosario” located in Villa Queñuani, Yunguyo District, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno; she is 49 years old, lives with her partner, and has five children. She lives in the Porteño neighborhood and she has completed the 4th graD.. This is Valentina's first loan with Kiva partner Movimiento Manuela Ramos; she is requesting PEN 500, which will allow her to increase her capital for her business buying and selling livestock. She wants to help her granddaughter since all of her sons are married. Valentina's biggest wish is to keep working. She likes the convenience the loans proviD..

Translated from Spanish by Violeta Rubiani, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying livestock

loans.name: Ka

texts.en:
Ka L. is a 31-year-old farmer and mother. She is blessed with two kids, both of whom are attending the public high school and are dependent on her income. Her husband, Keng Voth, (pictured) is 32 years of age and works in the farming business.

Ka L. inherited the farmland, where she and her husband grow different kinds of crops, from her grandmother. Ka L. faces difficulty with transportation when buying the farm supplies for her business, because she does not own her own vehicle. Thus, she requested a loan to buy an old motorcycle and will use the remainder of the loan to buy fertilizer for her crop.

loans.use: To buy an old motorcycle and fertilizer for her crop

loans.name: Marcia

texts.es:
La señora Marcia es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” Ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 49 años de edad, de estado civil casada, tiene 03 hijos, vive en el Barrio Central, estudio solo hasta el 1er grado de educación primaria.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela R. hace 9 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de orégano.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar   orégano, y ganado menor para engorde.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan los ahorros y las reuniones,
texts.en:
Mrs. Marcia is a member of the communal bank “Vírgen del Rosario” located in Villa Queñuani, Yunguyo District, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno; she is 49 years old, is married, and has three children. She lives in the Central neighborhood and she has completed only the first grade. Marcia has been working with Kiva partner Movimiento Manuela R. for nine years. Her first loan was for PEN 300, which allowed her to increase her capital for her business buying and selling oregano. Today, she is requesting a new loan of PEN 500, which will allow her to buy oregano, and small animals to fatten and resell. Marcia's biggest wish is to keep working. She loves to save and going to loan center meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Violeta Rubiani, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying oregano and sheep

loans.name: Nerissa

texts.en: Nerissa D. is a 40-year-old entrepreneur from Pasay City. She is married to Emmanuel, 41, a train operator. Two of their three children are still in school. Nerissa is a dealer of ready-made foot rugs and round rugs. To help augment family income, she also rents out their family car to interested patrons. She earns P7,000 a month from these combined business activities. Nerissa came to know about and became a member of the Center for Community Transformation (CCT) Credit Cooperative only last year. She has just finished repaying her previous CCT loan and has applied for a new loan in the amount of P10,000 since their car’s engine is due for overhauling. Nerissa dreams of managing a fleet of brand new cars for her car rental service. About CCT The Center for Community Transformation (CCT) is an organized Christian response against poverty and social injustice. This is carried out through the fusion of social development initiatives and evangelical mission in a uniquely Filipino context. It serves urban and rural poor communities throughout the Philippines, in pursuit of its desire to see changed lives, strong families, and transformed communities centered in the Lordship of Jesus Christ. CCT is a member of the Five Talents family.

loans.use: To pay for engine overhaul of the car she rents out

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta A. is from the village of Salimbal, Lugait, Misamis Oriental. She is 44, married and has 7 school-aged children. To make a living, Julieta owns & operates a business making & selling specialty food products in the local community. Julieta has had her business for over 4 years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In October 2009, Julieta joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Julieta is requesting a loan of 5000 PHP, which she will use to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. This loan will be the 1st loan taken out by Julieta from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora Maria es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen del Rosario” Ubicado en Villa Queñuani, del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 39 años de edad, de estado civil casada, tiene 02 hijos, vive en el Barrio Progreso, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar.

La señora inicia su trabajo con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos con un préstamo inicial de S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado menor para engorde.

Su mayor deseo es aumentar su capital.

A ella le  gustan las facilidades en los préstamos y las reuniones

loans.use: Para la compra de animales menores (aovinos y chanchos)

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina O. is from the village of San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del sur. She is 21, married and has 2 infants. To make a living, Cristina owns & operates a pedicab transport service. Cristina has had her business for over 2 years and earns approximately 8,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Cristina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Cristina repaid a previous loan of 10,000 PHP from GDMPC, which she used to repair her vehicle and provide better service. Cristina is requesting a new loan of 15,000 PHP which will be used to purchase an additional vehicle for the business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional vehicle for the business

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline E. is a 62-year old widow living with her three adult children in a middle-class subdivision in Caloocan City.

Evangeline has been in business for twenty years now.  She has a very competitive general store located just in front of her house.  Business was doing well when her husband passed away.  His loss took its toll on Evangeline and her business.  But she was able to eventually move on and her general store came back to life.  She is now earning P14, 000 a month.

She joined the Center for Community Transformation (CCT) Credit Cooperative in 2004.  She has been active in inviting other women in her community to her group.  She just finished repaying her previous loan with the cooperative.  And now on her 11th loan cycle, she has applied for a loan of P29, 000.00 as additional capital for her store. She dreams of having a larger grocery store some day.  



About CCT

The Center for Community Transformation (CCT) is an organized Christian response against poverty and social injustice.  This is carried out through the fusion of social development initiatives and evangelical mission in a uniquely Filipino context.  It serves urban and rural poor communities throughout the Philippines, in pursuit of its desire to see changed lives, strong families, and transformed communities centered in the Lordship of Jesus Christ.  

CCT is a member of the Five Talents family.

loans.use: additional capital

loans.name: Genara

texts.es:
La señora Genara es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 42 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos, vive en la av panamericana en el distrito de Zepita, estudio educación secundaria incompleta (3er grado).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de verduras.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 3000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar verduras, frutas, abarrotes y también insumos para elaboración de pan.

Su mayor deseo es comprar un terreno en Juliaca y Tacna para darles a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las facilidades en los préstamos.

loans.use: Para la compra de verduras, frutas, abarrotes y también insumos para elaboración de pan.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn A. is from the village of Brgy. Santiago, Iligan City. She is 26, married and has 3 school-aged children. To make a living, Evelyn owns & operates a sari-sari (variety) retail shop, where she sells daily use products such as shampoo, soap & toothpaste to the local community. Evelyn has had her business for over 2 years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Evelyn joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Evelyn is requesting her first loan of 5000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell.  She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to support the education of her children. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

location.town: Santiago, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Antonia es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero D. Agosto” D. distrito D. Zepita, Provincia D. Chucuito, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 57 años D. edad,  estado civil Viuda, tiene 04 hijos, vive en la Av. panamericana en el distrito D. Zepita, ella no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años, su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. frutas.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar plátanos, naranjas, piñas, uvas, etc. Las compra en Juliaca  y Desaguadero y lo venD. en el mercado D. zepita.

Su mayor deseo es sacar profesionales a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros, las facilidades en los préstamos y las reuniones

loans.use: Para la compra de plátanos, naranjas, piñas, uvas,

loans.name: Celestina

texts.es:
La señora Celestina es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero D. Agosto” D. distrito D. Zepita, Provincia D. Chucuito, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 49 años D. edad, estado civil casada, tiene 05 hijos, vive en el Barrio Panamericana en el distrito D. Zepita, ella no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años, su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. repuestos.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 300.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar algunos repuestos para carros.

Su mayor deseo es poner una tienda D. venta D. repuestos para carros.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y las facilidades en los préstamos.

loans.use: Para la compra de algunos repuestos para carro.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La señora Yolanda es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 37 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 03 hijos, vive en la comunidad de Izani en el distrito de Zepita, ella estudio hasta el 2do grado de primaria.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado menor.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado mayor para engorde, además la señora Yolanda tiene su puesto de venta de carne.

Su mayor deseo es poner un establo grande y ayudar a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las reuniones
texts.en:
Yolanda is a member of the "Primero de Agosto" Community Bank, from the District of Zepita, Province of Chucuito, Region of Puno. She is 37 years old, is in a civil union marriage, and has three children. She lives in the community of Izani in the District of Zepita. She has a second grade education. She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for three years. Her first loan was S/ 300.00 Nuevos Soles, which allowed her to increase her the capital for her buy-sell cattle business. Yolanda is currently requesting a loan of S/. 1500.00 Nuevos Soles, which will allow her to buy older cattle to fatten as well as maintain the meat-selling stand she has. Her biggest desire is to build a big stable for her cattle and help her children. She appreciates the savings and the meetings that are offered to her.

Translated from Spanish by Colleen Godfrey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of cattle

loans.name: Rubenita

texts.en:
Rubenita A. is from Suarez, Iligan City. She is 43, married and has 9 adult-aged children. To make a living, Rubenita owns & operates  a food stall. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from selling specialty food products in the local community. Rubenita has had her business for over 3 years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Rubenita joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Rubenita is requesting her first loan of 5000 PHP, which she will use to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

location.town: Suarez, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Antonia es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero D. Agosto” D. distrito D. Zepita, Provincia D. Chucuito, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 58 años D. edad, estado civil casada, tiene 08 hijos, vive en la Comunidad D. Huilacaya, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 5 años, su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. ganado menor.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado menor para engorD..

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las reuniones

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado menor.

loans.name: Meak

texts.en: M. is a 24 years old married woman and mother. She lives in a small house where she owns a grocery shop, on which she sells cooking supply and some sweets to her neighbor in the village. To help provide with the family’s living food, her husband drives a motorcycle taxi driver(he appears in the picture). M. currently takes care of two kids who attend in the primary school. M. requested a loan of US$600 for her husband to replace an old motor taxi that is not attractive to the customer and the rest of the loan she will buy more grocery inventory to sell.

loans.use: To replace an old motor taxi that is not attractive to the customer and the rest of the loan she will buy more grocery inventory to sell

loans.name: Maria Elvira

texts.es:
La señora Elvira es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 57 años de edad, estado civil soltera, tiene 03 hijos, vive en la Calle San Martín en el distrito de Zepita, ella estudio hasta 4to grado de secundaria.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de venta de comida.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos, papas, condimentos, etc., para su negocio de venta de comida y su tienda de venta de abarrotes.

Su mayor deseo es seguir trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros.

loans.use: Para la compra de arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos, papas, condimentos, etc.,

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Para la compra de zanahoria, cebolla, apio, zapallo, yucas, etc

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma A. is from Kabacsanan, Iligan City. She is 34, married and has 1 school-aged child. To make a living, Emma owns & operates a sari-sari (variety) retail shop, where she sells both food & daily use products in the local community. Emma has had her business for over 4 years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Emma joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Emma is requesting a loan of 8000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offerings. This will be her 2nd loan from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offerings

location.town: Kabacsanan, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Lemalyn

texts.en:
Lemalyn J. is asking from KIVA lenders the amount of Php 6,000 to purchase more items of personal collection cosmetics products. She has about two years from her business. Lemalyn is 32 years old married to Jimmy J.. They are gifted with three children and all are sending in school to take their studies. Even she is pregnant and about to deliver her baby soon, she is looking for her costumers around their village to have income and savings for her future emergencies.  

Her husband is busy in working with their field activities. Their yield could not able to sustain her children expenditures in school when she is delivering her baby. She needs additional capital to purchase her costumers order in her business products.

loans.use: additional capital for buying more products to sell

loans.name: Elsa Elizabeth

texts.es:
La señora Elizabeth es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 32 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 02 hijos, vive en la comunidad de san Sebastián, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace mas de 1 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de abarrotes.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 800.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar arroz azúcar, leche, fideos, aceite, etc. al mismo tiempo la señora también se dedica a al a venta de comida en días de feria.
